selected_quotes: The effects of spinal manipulation have nothing to do with where or how you manipulate #Myth
Spinal manipulations, again evidence showing its not what u do, just that u do it helps #physio #myths
Yeah manipulation needs to be specific- - yeah sure the effect will be from bottom up neuromudulation- 👌😳
No difference between specific and non-specific #manipulation for chronic low back pain. #EBP2 #LBP
The need for specific level manipulation for low back = a load of CRAP invented by osteos chiros #Myths #BS

citation.abstract: Manual therapists typically advocate the need for a detailed clinical examination to decide which vertebral level should be manipulated in patients with low back pain. However, it is unclear whether spinal manipulation needs to be specific to a vertebral level.
citation.title: Immediate Effects of Region-Specific and Non-Region-Specific Spinal Manipulative Therapy in Patients With Chronic Low Back Pain: A Randomized Controlled Trial.
